name: HOLO Cookies Not Inaff
description:
# 介紹

HOLO Cookies Not Inaff (Holo分身大爆走2)

因為古神的力量,使得Ina爆走了!Ame想到方法來阻止，但是似乎慢了一步?

# 玩法

"方向鍵": 移動

"C": 射擊

"X": 集中射擊 (按住)

"Z": 特殊技能

"SPACE": 暫停

"F": 全螢幕 (僅支援16:9螢幕)

"G": 降低解析度

"H": 提高解析度

# 支持語言

中文/英文/日文

# 免責聲明

基於不營利非商業行為及不違反 Cover 二次創作規範下，本作品在 Itch.io 平台提供玩家免費下載。

故事人物純屬虛構，如有雷同，實屬巧合。 Wawawa © 2023

# Introduction

HOLO Cookies Not Inaff (HOLO Bunshin Daibakusou 2)

Because of ancient one's power, made Ina rampageous! Ame has thought a way to stop it, but seems it's too late?

# How to play

"Arrow Keys": Move

"C": Shooting

"X": Massed shooting (Hold)

"Z": Special skill

"SPACE": Pause

"F": Full Screen (Only supports 16:9 screen)

"G": Lower resolution

"H": Higher resolution

# Support languages

Chinese/English/Japanese

# Disclaimer

This non-commercial game is produced according to Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement.

This work provides free download for players on the Itch.io platform.

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. Wawawa © 2023

# Change Log

V1.0 (2023/03/10) - 第一版正式發佈 / First version released.
